titles.title: Lime Research, Promotion, and Consumer Information Act Amendments of 1993
To amend the Lime Research, Promotion, and Consumer Information Act as it relates to the composition of the Lime Board, the conduct of the referendum, the definition of lime, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Specialty Crops and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 9/14/1993--Introduced. Lime Research, Promotion, and Consumer Information Act Amendments of 1993 - Amends the Lime Research, Promotion, and Consumer Information Act of 1990 to: (1) redefine lime; (2) revise Lime Board representation; and (3) change the initial referendum deadline.
